plot: A look at the vacant home/arson problem in the city of Detroit, through the eyes of the Detroit Firefighters who face Devil's Night every night.
title: Detroit on Fire 2010
plot_es: A look at the vacant home/arson problem in the city of Detroit, through the eyes of the Detroit Firefighters who face Devil's Night every night.
plot_en: A look at the vacant home/arson problem in the city of Detroit, through the eyes of the Detroit Firefighters who face Devil's Night every night.
